uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique UUIDv1 identifier for the envelope.

dig.title: Digest
dig.description: Digest of the canonical JSON body.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description:
Seals of approval from other organisations that can only be added to
non-draft envelopes.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Set of labels that describe but have no influence on the data.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured information about this envelope.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any information that may be relevant to other humans about this envelope

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: When true, implies that this document should not be considered final. Digital signatures are optional.

Header.description: Header defines the metadata of the body.
